cause.description:
The goal of Big Brothers Big Sisters is to provide the influence of positive adult role models and the friendship of caring adult mentors to children whose education, health, and safety are threatened. The vision is to create brighter futures, better schools, and stronger communities. What better feeling could there be than throwing a ball around with a kid who normally does not have anyone to throw a ball around with?
Sometimes it is the simple things that mean the most.
1. Life can be tough for some families; being a mentor can positively influence the life of a young child.
2. What better reward knowing you could have changed a child's life forever.
3. Kids need positive attention and encouragement in their lives to give them hope and to let them know that they can reach for the stars know matter wha
cause.mission: Be a mentor and positively influence the lives of young girls and boys so they will grow up to be confident and caring young adults.
cause.name: Support Big Brothers & Big Sisters
